channel.title: How do you add npcs with the moparscape 3.2 cleint/ server
channel.description: how would you go about doing this such as adding the level 25 experiments from runescape to your server?

item.title: How do you add npcs with the moparscape 3.2 cleint/ server
item.dc:creator: @x0_0wn x0 0wn
item.description:
@x0_0wn wrote:

Are experiments in the clients ? Or are they newly added ?
I know they’ve been around a while.

Read full topic
item.source: How do you add npcs with the moparscape 3.2 cleint/ server

item.title: How do you add npcs with the moparscape 3.2 cleint/ server
item.dc:creator: @Zombiedevice Zombiedevice
item.description:
@Zombiedevice wrote:

You can’t do that with Mopar. He’s client is sealed. You can if you download a client from here (OTHER THEN MOPAR OR SILABS) then you can add new NPC’s and things like that.

Read full topic
item.source: How do you add npcs with the moparscape 3.2 cleint/ server
